title: AMAZING!
review: Fantastic performances, fantastic cast, amazing movie!

title: PERFECT
review: There are movies, then there are movies, then there are MOVIES.This is one my favorites. I think the tone of the film is PERFECT for the story.The cast, the acting, the direction and of course the script are wonderful.

title: Cute , that's all
review: It's a cute way to pass 2 hours when your bored. Nothing special about it but enjoyable

title: This was AMAZING!
review: Truly a good film. Breather of fresh air in today's cinema.

title: The best Comic Movie
review: As far as what Marvel did in the first 10 years.... this for me was the best film. It was the most down to earth (comic wise) and relatable film of all. Don't get me wrong, I am a HUGE marvel fan and general have rated their movies high, (with the obvious exception of Captain Marvel) I liked this the best.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
title: These movies do not count towards the legacy
review:
1) None of these last 3 films progressed or concluded the sky walker storyline. AT ALL.
2) They used cheesy gimmicks to bring back nostalgia instead of thinking - what storyline actually progresses the sky walker legacy.
3) After they could not create a proper villain they decided to do what they did?!! (No spoiler inserted) ARE YOU KIDDING ME?I can literally bring up over 50 cheesy items about these last 3 films but I am TOO LAZY to continue.JJ Abrams PLEASE leave Star Wars alone and go back to do a Lost sequel. Except this time maybe you could bring us a real ending.These movies where complete trash.

title: Great segway...
review: Great segway through the first 10 years of Marvel. Amazing cast and story!

title: WOW
review: I went in to watch this originally ONLY because of its award win. I did not think the trailer was anything special and.... WOW. What a TRULY amazing piece of film. Not movie. Film. I absolutely recommend this.

title: Surprisingly Amazing!
review: Did not expect this movie to be soooo funny and entertaining. One of my favorites.

title: Real review - complete trash
review: This is one of the worst movies I have ever seen. It is absolutely unwatchable.Firstly the acting is horrific. It feels like I am back in acting class watching first year actors try their 'scenes'. How this film even got funding is beyond me. It was so bad that I had to fast forward through some scenes not to fall asleep.Secondly direction and script are tacky, weak, pointless and highly uninspired. Again pure amateur work .If you do not believe me feel free to watch it for yourself and compare it to quality independent movies that have come out in the past.I rarely say this but what a waste of time!

title: THE BEST OF THE BEST
review: A truly INCREDIBLE PERFORMANCE from an AMAZING MOVIE STAR/ACTOR.

title: Great Movie
review: As far as comic book movies go, this was very well done!
